get.summary: Returns list of the available services.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description:
Full text search filter that allow to query in alias and name fields.
Additional, query string may contains special symbols for filter (by default search by full match)
1. {^} - search any value that begins with query.
2. {@} - search any value that contains query.

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: Filter by services types in comma separated way.

parameters.name: orderByFields
parameters.description: A list of {ServiceInfoDc} fields for sorting. If a field starts with {-} ordering is by descending.

idAttribute.description: The name of the attribute that is used to uniquely identify a feature in the layer.

titleAttribute.description: The name of the attribute that is used as a displayed name of a feature in the layer.

geometryAttribute.description: The name of the attribute that is used for assigning geometry value for the feature.

geometryType.description: The type of the geometry of the layer.

spatialReference.description: The spatial reference of the layer.

attributes.description: The description of the attributes of the layer.

type.description: Type of the value of the attribute.

isNullable.description: If false, the attribute must have non-null value.

isEditable.description: Whether the value of the attribute can be edited after the entry was created.

isUnique.description: Whether more then one feature can have the same value of this attribute.

RemoteTileServiceConfigurationDc.description: Configuration for the remote tile service.

urlFormat.description:
SourceBatch url mask. Like http://{0}.website.ru/{1}/{2}/{3}.png
Where: {0} - SubDomains, {1} - Z, {2} - X, {3} - Y.

subDomains.description:
Subdomains. To get tiles from different servers.
Will be inserted into the UrlFormat {0}.

allowDirectAccess.description: Allows the client to receive tiles directly from the source server.

name.description: Name of the service.

alias.description: Human friendly name of the service.

origin.description: The zero point of the coordinates from which tiles are counted.

reversedY.description: If true, positive side of 'Y' coordinate, will be in the reverse side.

dpi.description: The dpi of the tiling scheme.

height.description: Height of each tile in pixels.

width.description: Height of each tile in pixels.

lods.description: List of levels of detail that define the tiling scheme.

sourceUrlMask.description: Mask for getting tiles in default form www.{s}.tiles.com/{z}/{x}/{y}.png

sourceServers.description: SourceBatch servers, what can be placed at source url mask, instead {s}.

tileInfo.description: Configuration of the service. This property is available only if the requesting user has CONFIGURE permission for the service.

dataServiceName.description: The name of the data service that the layer will use.

attributesConfiguration.description: Configuration of the attributes of the layer.

featuresLimit.description: Maximum number of features, that the service can return in a single request.

AttributesConfigurationDc.description: Configuration of the attribute set in a feature layer.

idAttribute.description: The name of the attribute that is used for identifying features.

titleAttribute.description: The name of the attribute that is used for setting feature name (optional).

geometryAttribute.description: The name of the attribute that contains the feature geometry.

tableName.description: The name of the table in data source service, that contains the data for this layer.

attributes.description: Configuration of the attributes of the layer.

title.description: Name of the style. This is used for identifying symbol in the layer legend.

condition.description:
Condition string for the style application. If the condition is not met for a feature,
nor the style nor its children are used when rendering the feature.

symbol.description: Symbol that is used to draw the features of the layer.

children.description:
Child styles. Before rendering a feature, the children style conditions are checked. If none
of the child styles were applied, then the paren style is used to draw the feature.

AttributeConfigurationDc.description: Configuration of an attribute in a feature layer.

columnName.description: The name of the column in the data table that holds the attribute values.

isEditable.description: If set to false, editing of the attribute value will be prohibited.

aggregation.description:
If this is an attribute from related table with one-to-many relationship, sets the aggregation function that will be used
to provide the single value for this attribute from many entries in the related table.

TableReferenceConfigurationDc.description: Configuration of a related table for feature layer.

referenceColumn.description: The column name in the base table that is used for foreign key relationship.

targetColumn.description: The column name in the related table that is used for foreign key relationship.

attributes.description: Configuration of the attributes that get values from this table.

Buffer operation calculates the buffer geometries around the input geometries and writes them
into the target storage.

target.description: Storage that is to be used as a target for writing the task result.

targetStorageDescription.description: The temp storage that is to be used as a target for writing the task results.

Availability area builder operation considers the nearest availability zones around the input geometries and writes them
into the target storage.

duration.description: Duration from start point in seconds.

source.description: Storage that is to be used as a data source for the task.

target.description: Storage that is to be used as a target for writing the task result.

source.description: Storage that is to be used as a data source for the task.

target.description: Storage that is to be used as a target for writing the task result.

toolLayer.description: Feature storage to use as a tool for subtraction.

source.description: Storage that is to be used as a data source for the task.

target.description: Storage that is to be used as a target for writing the task result.

serviceName.description: The name of the layer service.

createNewService.description: If set to true, a new service with the given LayerServiceName will be created before the task is executed.

condition.description: Attribute filter string that must be satisfied.

The service that contains geometries for filtering objects by geometry. If set, only the features that intersect with the
geometries in this storage will be copied.

source.description: Storage that is to be used as a data source for the task.

target.description: Storage that is to be used as a target for writing the task result.

innerTasks.description: The tasks to execute in the pipeline.

WorkspaceConfigurationDc.description: Configuration of a postgres service manager service.

allowedServiceTypes.description: If set, the service manager will be able to create only the services of the given types.

maxServiceCount.description:
If set and positive, the service manager will throw an exception during the creation of a child service
if the resulting number of the child service after the creation is greater than the given limit.

maxFeaturesInOneTable.description: If set, all layers and tables of this workspace will be limited to the given number of features.

name.description: Name of the service.

alias.description: Human friendly name of the service.

DataServiceConfiguration.description: Configuration of a postgres data service.

maxTables.description:
If set, the number of the tables in the data service will be limited by this number. If exceeded, an error will be
returned when trying to create a new table.

alias.description: Human friendly name of the service.

will case an error.

alias.description: Human friendly name of the service.

CirclePointSymbolDc.description: The symbol that draws a feature as a circle.

size.description: Diameter of the circle in pixels, as measured from the middle of the outer stroke.

fillColor.description: The color of the filling of the circle.

strokeColor.description: The color of the outline of the circle.

strokeWidth.description: The width of the outline of the circle in pixels.

offset.description: Offset of the circle center from the actual feature position (in pixels).

ParameterDc[Double].description:
Number parameter of a symbol. The parameter can be represented as a simple number, or
as an object with a "type" parameter specified.

type.description: Type of the parameter. Possible values are "simple", "byAttribute", "scale".

as an object with a "type" parameter specified.

type.description: Type of the parameter. Possible values are "simple", "byAttribute", "scale".

PolylineLabelSymbolDc.description: Label for polyline objects. It is drawn repeatedly along a line.

labelRepeatDistance.description: Distance in pixels after which the label will be repeated along the line.

criticalAngle.description: Maximum angle of the line in one point the label can bend for.

invertLabelDirection.description: If set to true, the label will be drawn in the direction opposite to the default one.

offsetFromSymbol.description: If set to true, the label will be drawn in the direction opposite to the default one.

offset.description: Distance from the line to offset the symbol.

maxWidth.description: Maximum with of the label in pixels.

ScaleParameterDc[Double].description: The parameter that uses the provided scale to choose it's value.

defaultValue.description:
If the resulting value of the expression is off the scale, or if the execution of the expression fails,
this value is used as the parameter value.

expression.description:
This expression is executed against the feature to be drawn, and the resulting number is used as the position
on the scale, from which the parameter value is taken.

scale.description: Scale that is used to get the parameter value.

parameterValue.description: The value that is used as the parameter value.

scaleValue.description: The position on the scale that corresponds to the SPCore.Connectors.Connectors.Base.Models.Style.Parameters.ScaleVertex`1.ParameterValue value.

ScaleParameterDc[Color].description: The parameter that uses the provided scale to choose it's value.

defaultValue.description:
If the resulting value of the expression is off the scale, or if the execution of the expression fails,
this value is used as the parameter value.

expression.description:
This expression is executed against the feature to be drawn, and the resulting number is used as the position
on the scale, from which the parameter value is taken.

scale.description: Scale that is used to get the parameter value.

parameterValue.description: The value that is used as the parameter value.

scaleValue.description: The position on the scale that corresponds to the SPCore.Connectors.Connectors.Base.Models.Style.Parameters.ScaleVertex`1.ParameterValue value.

ByAttributeParameterDc[Double].description: Parameter that selects the value by checking the given conditions. Type of this parameter is "byAttribute".

defaultValue.description: If none of the conditions in the SPCore.Connectors.Connectors.Base.Models.Style.Parameters.ByAttributeParameterDc`1.Values are met, this value is used.

values.description:
To choose the value for the parameter, this class checks the conditions in this array. The value of the first array entry
which condition returns true against a target feature, is used.

ConditionalValue[Double].description: An entry in values list of a by attribute parameter.

condition.description: Condition tha is checked against a feature to be drawn.

value.description: The value that is used, if the condition result is true.

ByAttributeParameterDc[Color].description: Parameter that selects the value by checking the given conditions. Type of this parameter is "byAttribute".

values.description:

ConditionalValue[Color].description: An entry in values list of a by attribute parameter.

condition.description: Condition tha is checked against a feature to be drawn.

value.description: The value that is used, if the condition result is true.
